name: Sweet Story Wet-Bottom Pie
description:
Sweet pudding, two cherries, and, of course, wet-bottom pie await you at the cafe. Come and get your piece!

Press "Ctrl + F" to get an easy win



Sweet Story Wet-Bottom Pie is a puzzle game in which you must collect all pairs of pictures to reproduce the image.

Enjoy lush pictures, great music, and leisurely gameplay with Wet Pie.
